message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $10,000.  I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. After careful consideration, I would like to offer $8,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,200. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident in its value.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer of $9,200 for the product. While I understand the value you place on it, I would like to counter with an offer of $8,500.
